tika.dc.description:
Brian

I may be a billionaire CEO of a successful conglomeration of businesses, but I’m not a good guy. I have a dark past, which leaks into my present more times than I care to admit.

When I met Cassidy twenty-seven years ago, it was love at first sight. The moment I saw her I knew I couldn’t let her go. Cassidy and I shared our hopes and dreams with each other. I promised her the moon…and then I let it all come crashing down on her.

When we reconnected, by chance, after spending decades apart, it was as if not a moment had passed. She was still the woman I loved, the woman I craved, the woman I needed.

I hope this time it could be forever…

Cassidy

I was getting these texts on my phone and pictures of my daughter, threats of what they’d do to her if I didn’t follow their instructions.

Their instructions wanted me to go back into my past, to the darkest moments of my past, and revive them.

They wanted me to look up the man who crushed my heart under his heel like it didn’t matter and convince him to love me again.

I’d do whatever it takes to get my daughter back—even if it meant destroying the man I once loved.

*Note: Brian is the first book in The Callahans series. It can be read as a standalone romance. My second box-set is included as a bonus :) *

**
